pageContext.claim: “You know, last night, we had 29,000 people, and we had people outside by the tens of thousands, the arena.”
pageContext.analysis: As usual, Trump inflates the crowd size. The Henderson Fire Department estimated about 5,600 people congregated inside the venue at the indoor event at Minden-Tahoe Airport, and security estimated a total of 20,000 including outside crowds, according to the Nevada Independent.
